deity.name: Asmodeus
deity.title: God of tyranny
deity.symbol: Three triangles in tight formation

deity.name: Avandra
deity.title: Goddess of change and luck
deity.symbol: Three stacked wavy lines

deity.name: Bahamut
deity.title: God of justice and nobility
deity.symbol: Dragon's head, in profile, facing left

deity.name: Bane
deity.title: God of war and conquest
deity.symbol: Claw with three talons pointing down

deity.name: Corellon
deity.title: God of magic and the arts
deity.symbol: Eight-pointed star

deity.name: Erathis
deity.title: Goddess of civilization and invention
deity.symbol: Upper half of a clockwork gear

deity.name: Gruumsh
deity.title: God of destruction
deity.symbol: Triangular eye with bony protrusions

deity.name: Ioun
deity.title: Goddess of knowledge
deity.symbol: Crook shaped like a stylized eye

deity.name: Kord
deity.title: God of strength and storms
deity.symbol: Sword with a lightning bolt cross guard

deity.name: Lolth
deity.title: Goddess of spiders and lies
deity.symbol: Eight-pointed star with a web motif

deity.name: Melora
deity.title: Goddess of wilderness and the sea
deity.symbol: Wavelike swirl

deity.name: Moradin
deity.title: God of creation
deity.symbol: Flaming anvil

deity.name: Pelor
deity.title: God of the sun and agriculture
deity.symbol: Circle with six outwardly radiating points

deity.name: Raven Queen
deity.title: Goddess of death
deity.symbol: Raven's head, in profile, facing left

deity.name: Sehanine
deity.title: Goddess of the moon
deity.symbol: Crescent moon

deity.name: Tharizdun
deity.title: God of madness
deity.symbol: Jagged counter-clockwise spiral

deity.name: Tiamat
deity.title: Goddess of wealth, greed, and vengeance

deity.name: Torog

deity.name: Zehir
